title: Max Forsey
meta_description: I like to research AI and build helpful tools 🛠️
main_content: Objective: increase healthspan Sleep blackout curtains for pitch black sleeping lamps for low light night routine for last hour of the day temperature(~68 degrees) the goal slightly cold 3-2-1 rule 3 hrs before sleep - no food 2 hrs before sleep - no water 1 hr before sleep - no screens journal 15 min before bed to clear thoughts pray to clear thoughts sun alarm brush teeth and skin routine in low lamp lighting potential changes I am considering mouth tape? mouth guard? Levoit or Phillips air filters Exercise push, pull, legs 3x a week (muscle mass and strength) yoga 1x a week (flexibility) bike to work, long run 1x a week, and soccer with friends (zone 2 cardio) 4 x 4 min sprints 1x a week (VO2 max) Teeth 2x a day tooth brushing electric toothbrush floss tongue scraper Clothing working to reduce all plastic clothing aiming to use merino wool, cotton, and tencel wherever possible ibex, ridge merino, icebreaker, smartwool, etc Diet cook with stainless steel pots and pans to avoid Teflon glass or metal tupperware old fashioned oats most mornings metal refillable water bottles (I use Owala) currently use Mediteranian diet with small modifications don't drink soda, alcohol, cofffee, nor smoke (I have strong response to caffeine so I use sparingly) monthly 1 day fast for autophagy (I've tried longer fasts but currently don't want to decrease muscle mass) Supplements 5g of creatine monohydrate daily (neuroprotective and muscle gains) potential changes I am considering daily fiber here or psylium husks EPA/DHA daily Bryan Johnson’s longevity mix Eyes 20-20-20 rule: every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds Face Morning: Cerave cleanser, Trader Joe's Daily Facial Sunscreen SPF 30 Night: Cerave cleanser, Retinol, Cosrx Advanced Snail 96 Mucin Feet injinji toe socks only wear shoes with wide toe box and zero drop I currently wear Topo Athletic, Earthrunners, and Vivobarefoot Other brands I've considered: Lonoflow, feelgrounds, and lems Mental Health Transcendental Meditation Yoga Nidra Mindfulness Journaling Therapy Sources & Tools consumer guides Yuka nutrition facts general roadmap own your labs runna calorie counting siphox health function health chatgpt for longevity podcasts heart scan test prevention guidelines Mental Health Peter Attia (fantastic podcast) Bryan Johnson (great videos) Dave Pascoe (love the simplicity of his approach) David Minkoff Jenvel David Sinclair (very focused on science like lengthening telomeres) Tim Ferriss (more noise but I like 4 hour body) Andrew Huberman (lots of noise) Dr.Mike (he has a phd in exercise science) Books and Media Outlive by Peter Attia Fixing your feet by John Vonhof Sleep: The Myth of 8 Hours, the Power of Naps, and the New Plan to Recharge Your Body and Mind by Nick Littlehales (I like this better than why we sleep by Matthhew Walker) ← Back to home
